topic.title: Discover new sites and auto seed on console
topic.body:
Hello, it would be great (for me as seeder) to have a way to find all (or maybe the most important or with less seeders) sites in the network to automatically start seeding those sites in console...
I have been thinking about this becouse I have a bunch of VPS on my own including some other physical PCs, and I want to help this network grow.
